entry.title: spring-boot-related
entry.content:
Step by step create â€œdao service controllerâ€

  • step1. Model

    • create model folder
    • create â€œUserâ€ class in model folder
    • example

  • step2. Dao

    • create â€œdaoâ€ folder
    • create â€œUserDaoâ€ interface in â€œdaoâ€ folder
    • create â€œimplâ€ folder in â€œdaoâ€ folder
    • create â€œUserDaoImplâ€ class in â€œimplâ€ folder

  • step3. Service

    • create â€œserviceâ€ folder
    • create â€œUserServiceâ€ interface in â€œserviceâ€ folder
    • create â€œimplâ€ folder in â€œserviceâ€ folder
    • create â€œUserServiceImplâ€ class in â€œimplâ€ folder
